page.title: 12A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: This account has been written by Linda Kerrison who lives at Little Prospect Farmhouse, Monxton. On Friday I get up at 7:00 o'clock then I get ready for school. I go down stairs and have something to eat, normally a bowl of cereal,Rice Krispees and milk. My mummy gets ready for W.I. that is, Womens Institute. We get in to the car and mummy takes me to school before she goes to the W.I.. Jacky, my elder sister goes to her school, John Hanson Comprehensive School, after me. When I have got to school I play for a little time. Then I have to get my work out. I do maths most of the morning. On Friday the class has a spelling and maths test. In the afternoon we do anything. At 3.30 p.m. we put our work away and put the chairs up and go home.
